<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
 
 The split is for training and validation set is not correct.
 This line should be changed.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jhfjhfj1/autokeras/blob/develop/autokeras/image_supervised.py#L220>https://github.com/jhfjhfj1/autokeras/blob/develop/autokeras/image_supervised.py#L220</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproducing Steps</denchmark-h>
 
 It doesn't crash the program
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 Use 10% of the dataset as the validation set.
 If the validation set is larger than 5000 instances, use 5000 instances in the validation set.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Setup Details</denchmark-h>
 
 Any setup.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>
